ai-patthana22.16:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.16:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the river, the partners and the bondservants.
ai-patthana22.16:1.1_0: Not skilled in the teaching, skilled in terminology, and skilled in causes.
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_0: No skilled in the undeclared points.
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_1: Nose has not been declared by an indeterminate mind.
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_2: No by nature, nor by nature, nor by nature, the causes and conditions are causes and reasons.
